website_summaries.verdict: Affordable alternative that brightens skin and improves overall skin tone.
pros: Half the price of other concealers on our list
Uses natural ingredients like tumeric root and vitamin C to brighten skin
Comes with two tones to create the perfect match for your skin
cons: This concealer tends toward a matte feel once it dries

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Receive What Was Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because it is advertised as the liquid concealer. What I received in the mail was not liquid. It was a twist up concealer stick and I don’t like the coverage it provides. Now I am out of my liquid concealer and have to go buy another concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Werre

customer_reviews.title: The light is too dark
customer_reviews.text: A light concealer should be just that...light. This shade is more of a medium tint and too dark for my skin. Not a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1928

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Near perfect. The texture is amazing-creamy but not cakey as it says. Despite it being very close to spot covering well it still takes time and repeatition/additional layers to actually conceal acne.
customer_reviews.author: Jess_d

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage With A Natural Look
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for several years and absolutely love it! Goes on easily and blends well. I love a natural look and this provides great coverage without that "made up" look.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnys mom

customer_reviews.title: Lasting concealer perfect for those fine lines
customer_reviews.text: Favorite concealer of all time! I am 43 and love this because it does not settle into those fine lines. Brightens and is not heavy at all!
customer_reviews.author: JTSHAVER

customer_reviews.title: It really conceals!
customer_reviews.text: Great concealer. Works best when leave on area you want concealed for about 30 seconds before blending and full coverage. Repeat step as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Same color but recieved a stick concealer rather than the creamy applicator concealer.... would like refund or right one sent.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This product was for m daughter, she really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mll

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the product arrived broken. The box wasn’t broken, but the makeup tube was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: favorite concealer so far but doesnt last all day for me
customer_reviews.author: kayleen cooley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: An empty package was delivered with no product in it?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brans

customer_reviews.title: or if possibly the one I received is just old/expired - but it definitely feels like a different product than the NARS Radiant Concealer I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if there was a different product somehow put into the bottle, or if possibly the one I received is just old/expired - but it definitely feels like a different product than the NARS Radiant Concealer I've purchased in stores. There's nothing radiant about it, it's very thick and doesn't move (blend) the same as the product I've purchased in stores. This is also $3-4 more than purchasing in store - which I was willing to pay for the convenience of it being shipped to my house in 2 days, but it's not the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Tibs

customer_reviews.title: Never using anything else
customer_reviews.text: I have the darkest circles under my eyes that I have not been able to cover up. Probably for at least a decade. Ew. But I treated myself to getting my makeup done at Sephora for my birthday and this is what the makeup artist used on me. I haven't used anything else since. Swear by it. People think I am 10 years younger.
customer_reviews.author: Jwass09

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a while. I like that it has good coverage, great color, and doesn't look cakey.
customer_reviews.author: STCT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff so much. Lasts me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer, No. 2.75 Cannelle/Light, 0.22 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:No. 2.75 Cannelle/Light| Size:0.22 OunceCoveted by artists for its luxurious texture and luminous finish, new radiant creamy concealer evens skin with lightweight medium to high buildable coverage. long wearing and crease-proof.
feature_bullets: The eyes for a soft, matte finish
Country of origin is United States
